name: 假如我是人工智能 Big Brother Is Shaping You
description: It's a serious game about AI, PRISM, big data, privacy, and free speech.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Any cpu made within the last 5 years Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card made within the last 5 years Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: You can play this game as long as your computer can start.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 12 Processor: Intel Core i11 Intel 11990NB Memory: 1024 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA TITAN VI 512G Storage: 200 GB available space Additional Notes: This is a AAA VR game actually. You see screenshots differently because your PC can't make it.
